entities.name: men
entities.description: Refers to the people arriving to put up the tent for the wedding. (Excerpt: "men arrive tomorrow . . . to put up the tent for the wedding")

entities.name: tent
entities.description: A structure that will be set up for the wedding. (Excerpt: "put up the tent for the wedding")

entities.name: wedding
entities.description: An event being organized by Mrs. Weasley. (Excerpt: "the wedding")

entities.name: Millamant's Magic Marquees
entities.description: A company providing services for the wedding. (Excerpt: "Millamant’s Magic Marquees . . . they’re very good.")

entities.name: Bill
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley's son who is escorting the people from Millamant's Magic Marquees. (Excerpt: "Bill’s escorting them.")

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The person being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley. (Excerpt: "You’d better stay inside while they’re here, Harry.")

entities.name: Mrs. Weasley
entities.description: A person who is organizing the wedding and talking to Harry. (Excerpt: "I didn’t mean — well, your safety’s much more important!")

entities.name: Remus
entities.description: Someone Mrs. Weasley invites to celebrate Harry's birthday. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Someone Mrs. Weasley invites to celebrate Harry's birthday. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: Someone Mrs. Weasley asks if she should invite to celebrate Harry's birthday. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")

relationships.description: Harry is involved in the wedding. (Excerpt: "It’s the day before the wedding.")
Bill works for Millamant's Magic Marquees. (Excerpt: "Bill’s escorting them.")
Mrs. Weasley is organizing the wedding. (Excerpt: "I didn’t mean — well, your safety’s much more important!")
Remus will be a guest at Harry's birthday celebration. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")
Tonks will be a guest at Harry's birthday celebration. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")
Hagrid will be a guest at Harry's birthday celebration. (Excerpt: "And how about Hagrid? And how about Remus and Tonks?")
